(n) 
- Work comprising recurring periods in which different groups of workers do the same jobs in relay.
eg: If he works a six-day week including shift work and overtime, this brings his total salary up to £20,000.

(n) gaining of control, change of ownership, purchase
- An act of assuming control of something, especially the buying out of one company by another:
eg: they sought a controlling interest rather than a takeover

(n) employees,human resources, Lực lượng lao động

eg: Pressure will grow to upgrade industries and workforce.

eg: we were struggling to get better wages.

 Make someone redundant.
